subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Caroline Wozniacki beat Maria Sharapova in Singapore, repeating her victory from the fourth round of the United States Open. Agnieszka Radwanska had a comfortable win over Petra Kvitova.
snippet: Caroline Wozniacki beat Maria Sharapova in Singapore, repeating her victory from the fourth round of the United States Open. Agnieszka Radwanska had a comfortable win over Petra Kvitova.
